Ran Kekulu account can be opened at any Bank of Ceylon branch island wide by a parent or a guardian for their children below 18 years.Offer 5%  interest rate.Want Original birth certificate of the child together with a photocopy,NIC of guardian.Main Menu #DEPOSIT #LOAN

18+ account can be opened at any Bank of Ceylon branch by any Sri Lankan citizen between the age of 18 to 25.Offer 0.5% higher interest rate than the normal savings account.Want NIC and Address proof.Main Menu #DEPOSIT #LOAN

BoC Normal Savings Accounts can be opened by any Sri Lankan Citizen above the age of 18 years at any Bank of Ceylon branch island wide.Offer 4%  interest rate.Want NIC and Address proof.Main Menu #DEPOSIT #LOAN

BOC Senior Citizens Account can be opened at any Bank of Ceylon Branch island wide by a Sri Lankans over the age of 55 years.Offer 5%  interest rate.Want NIC and Address proof.Main Menu #DEPOSIT #LOAN

BOC Kantha Ran GinumAccount can be opened at any Bank of Ceylon Branch island wide if you are a woman of 18 years old or above.Offer 0.5% higher interest rate than the normal savings account.Want NIC and address proof.Main Menu #DEPOSIT #LOAN

Sri Lankans over 18 Years of age are eligible to open an account.Minimum Deposit Rs. 10,000/.Period – 01,03,06 Months and 01 to 05 Years.Rates changeble accoring to government rules and regulations.More info contact 011-XXXXXXX.Main Menu #DEPOSIT #LOAN
what is the age limit that you belong? #PERSONAL #LEASING #EDUCATION

Can be applied for any personal requirement.Requirement: Government Service receiving a minimum take home salary of Rs. 30,000/,Statutory Bodies/enlisted Companies receiving a take home salary above Rs. 40,000/-.Maximum loan amount is Rs. 10,000,000/.Rate 9.25%.Main Menu #DEPOSIT #LOAN
For Vehicles - Both registered and unregistered.Contact our leasing manager 011-XXXXXXX.Main Menu #DEPOSIT #LOAN

Can apply for local & forign universities.Option of paying only the interest until the degree is complete.BOC Customers, Students with minimum of 03 passes for G.C.E (A/L) or Students with minimum of 3 passes for G.C.E. (A/L) can apply this loan. you should want Loan Application,Letter from University,Proof of identification (NIC/Passport).Main Menu #DEPOSIT #LOAN
